name: Evolution Snowboarding
synopsis: The year is 20XX and evil Boardroids have taken over the world. Now it's your job to save the slopes from this alien invasion. Along with some of the top snowboarders in the world, including Danny Kass and Todd Richards, you'll take on a variety of enemies, challenges, and boss characters as you attempt to win back the world mountain by mountain. Luckily, you're equipped with the latest in snowboarding gear to aid you in over 80 missions in eight intense levels.
